channel.title: [MISC] Karma - (canned)
channel.description:
**You’re quite the problem, aren’t you?** ________________________________ > *How do you sleep easy in this world?* > This game is more of a MISC than a Roleplay, for those who want that! This will give me vital knowledge for a coming Misc/Rp in the future (*cough cough* DeathNote *cough ahem*.) > *A murderous killer has come into this world, leaving victim after victim. The Chief Police Officer assigned trusted men to track this person down. But it isn’t enough. So the world’s best Detective, known only as Dante to the world at large, got interested in the case. Working closely with the Police, Dante is confident that this killer WILL be apprehended.*
**One player will be the Murderer. For public image, that will be handled by the Journalists.** **One player will be Dante. He will have numerous resources.** **Some players may be Detectives assigned to the case. They can assign a Head Detective, who will work closest with Dante and have further resources.** **Some players may be Journalists. They manipulate the Public Opinion and determine which information is released publicly.** ___ **This game uses an ingame calandar. Dante and the Police have up to one year (365 days) to capture the Murderer. This clock can be cut short dramatically by certain events (Example; if Dante is murdered). However, it can also be increased if certain information is found, and the likelihood of capturing the Murderer is *very* high.** ___ > ### [color=skyblue]Public Opinion:[/color] [color=gray]Defiant[/color]
**Karma -** 1. ~~James~~ [color=blue]**Detective Piston**[/color] :blue_heart: 2. Simon 3. PoisonedSquid 4. Hja 5. Boss110 6. Soulshade 7. Strangle 8. JakeTheWolfie 9. DirectorHail **Journalist Cain** 10. GamerPoke 11. Marshal 12. KyoDaz **Journalist TessA** 13. Kai 14. Insanity
> **Journalist Reports -** > [15 Found Dead at Westshire Hotel - Written by Nicholas Cain](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-game-begins/79284/76?u=magnus) > > [Hey readers, it’s TessA! Today we’re going to be discussing recent MURDERS! This article also DISPROVES slanderous claims! - Written by Tess Ardent](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-reassured/79284/102?u=magnus) > > [Crazy Town Mastakiller on loose - Written by Luke Cross](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-reassured/79284/113?u=magnus) > > [My Little Pony: Off the Leash - Written by Luke Cross](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-reassured/79284/114?u=magnus) > > [Journalist Tess Ardent May be in Trouble, Police gain Ground on the Murderer Investigation - Written by Nicholas Cain](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-uncertain/79284/130?u=magnus) > > [Forgery - Written by Luke Cross](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-riot/79284/132?u=magnus) > > [Courtcase - Written by Magnus](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-distracted/79284/134?u=magnus) > > [Mastakiller Strikes Down a Detective - Written by Nicholas Cain](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-12-public-opinion-distracted/79284/141?u=magnus) > > [Tank Regulations - Written by Tess Ardent](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-12-13-public-opinion-distressed/79284/223?u=magnus) > > [Tess Ardent - Free from the corruption of the Police - Written by Tess Ardent](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-13-14-public-opinion-distressed/79284/225?u=magnus) > > [Tessa Ardent - Flagrant Law Avoider - Written by Thomas Paine](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-karma-13-14-public-opinion-supportive/79284/226?u=magnus)
